Scars.name: 1 HP - Lasting Scar
Scars.description:
Roll 1d6. 1: Neck, 2: Hands, 3: Eye, 4: Chest, 5: Legs, 6: Ear.

Roll 1d6.

If the total is higher than your max HP, take the new result.

Scars.name: 2 HP - Rattling Blow
Scars.description:
You're disoriented and shaken. Describe how you refocus.

Roll 1d6.

If the total is higher than your max HP, take the new result.

Scars.name: 3 HP - Walloped
Scars.description:
You're sent flying and land flat on your face, winded. You are deprived until you rest for a few hours.

Then, roll 1d6.

Add that amount to your max HP.

Scars.name: 4 HP - Broken Limb
Scars.description:
Roll 1d6. 1-2: Leg, 3-4: Arm, 5: Rib, 6: Skull.

Once mended, roll 2d6.

If the total is higher than your max HP, take the new result.

Scars.name: 5 HP - Diseased
Scars.description:
You're afflicted with a gross, uncomfortable infection.

When you get over it, roll 2d6.

If the total is higher than your max HP, take the new result.

Scars.name: 6 HP - Reorienting Head Wound
Scars.description:
Roll 1d6. 1-2: STR, 3-4: DEX, 5-6: WIL.

Roll 3d6.

If the total is higher than your current Attribute, take the new result.

Scars.name: 7 HP - Hamstrung
Scars.description:
You can barely move until you get serious help and rest.

After recovery, roll 3d6.

If the total is higher than your max DEX, take the new result.

Scars.name: 8 HP - Deafened
Scars.description:
You cannot hear anything until you find extraordinary aid.

Regardless, make a WIL save.

If you pass, increase your max WIL by 1d4.

Scars.name: 9 HP - Re-brained
Scars.description:
Some hidden part of your psyche is knocked loose.

Roll 3d6.

If the total is higher than your max WIL, take the new result.

Scars.name: 10 HP - Sundered
Scars.description:
An appendage is torn off, crippled, or useless. (The Warden will tell you which.)

Then make a WIL save.

If you pass, increase your max WIL by 1d6.

Scars.name: 11 HP - Mortal Wound
Scars.description:
You are deprived and out of action. You die in one hour unless healed.

Upon recovery, roll 2d6.

Take the new result as your max HP.

Scars.name: 12 HP - Doomed
Scars.description:
Death seemed ever so close, but somehow you survived. If your next save against critical damage is a fail, you die horribly.

If you pass, roll 3d6.

If the total is higher than your max HP, take the new result.
